attributes.action: create a 9pm curfew for under 18s to control Anti social behaviour.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Reclaim our streets from yobs, Children under 18 have no reason to be out on the streets after a certain time, 9 pm for example. Children of this age should be in their own homes so their own parents/gaurdian can take charge of them.
If under 18s are found on the streets during the curfew then they should be returned home. If this persists then the offender should be forced to do community service, named and shamed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
